Class ArticleDetailDto

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.DTOs.Article
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Comprehensive Data Transfer Object for article detail views. Contains all metadata, content, and user interaction state for full article display.

public class ArticleDetailDto
Inheritance
object
ArticleDetailDto
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()

object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)

Remarks

This DTO is used when displaying a single article in detail view, including: full content, author information, media attachments, and all user interaction states.

Performance note: Content field can be large; consider lazy loading or streaming for very long articles on memory-constrained devices.
